body.name: SOTOMO Elongated One Piece Toilet with Soft Closing Seat, 12'' Rough-In Modern Toilet for Bathrooms, 1.28 GPF Dual Flush, MAP 1000g, 28.4 x 15.5 x 26.6 Inches Standard White Toilet bowl

features: Modern Toilets for Bathrooms: The SOTOMO elongated one-piece toilet ensures user comfort and modern simplicity, adding elegance to your home living. It is suitable for various bathroom styles.

Map Flush 1000 Grams: Attains an outstanding Maximum Performance Flush score of 1000 grams and complies with WaterSense criteria. This compact elongated toilet can achieve reduced water usage while delivering more efficient flushing.

Powerful Dual Flush: The SOTOMO rimless tornado flush toilet features a robust flush that efficiently eliminates waste. With a dual flush of 1.1/1.6 gallons per flush (GPF), averaging 1.28 GPF, contributing to the conservation of Earth's water resources.

Easy to Install: Side-mounted installation holes offer flexibility for plumbers, and the quick-release toilet seat reduces installation time. We provide clear instructions and video guides for a straightforward installation process.

Easy to clean: The SOTOMO toilet's ceramic body is hard and smooth, thanks to high-temperature firing, making the toilet bowl resistant to stains and reducing the frequency of brushing. The one-piece toilet's skirted design eliminates nooks and crannies, saving you cleaning time.

Designed for your comfort: Our 18.43 inch elongated seat provides extra space and optimal support, complemented by a comfortable 16.63-inch seat height that ensures easy transitions. Elevate your bathroom experience with ease and luxury.

What You Get:The package includes the toilet, soft-close toilet seat, pre-installed flush valve, premium wax ring, floor bolts, toilet tank lid, side cover sets and installation instructions. 12-month worry-free warranty, and our life-time friendly customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SOTOMO Modern Toilet, Highlight the Beauty of Your Bathroom! SOTOMO MJ-80 one piece toilet seamlessly blend the tank and bowl, creating a sleek and effortlessly clean design that brings a touch of modern elegance to your powder room and bathroom. Versatile enough to complement any decor style, this toilet redefines both form and function.

Easy Installation for the SOTOMO Toilet We've already set up the water parts and seat to save your time during installation. The installation holes on both sides, making it easy for your plumber to operate. Plus, we provide clear step-by-step instructions and videos, so installation is a breeze.

Simplicity in Maintenance and Cleaning Without a device connecting the tank to the bowl, one-piece toilets are less prone to cracking and leaking, ensuring greater durability. The one-piece skirted design is also compact and easy to clean compared to traditional two-piece toilets.

High-Temperature Fired Quality Constructed with 2246°F high-temperature-fired durable ceramic, the SOTOMO MJ-80 toilet resists fading, cracking, and abrasions. The sturdy and smooth all-ceramic toilet bowl is also resistant to stains, preventing discoloration over time.

Elongated Toilet Seat The compact elongated bowl of the SOTOMO MJ-80 toilet provides enhanced comfort while occupying the same space as a round-front bowl. The extended toilet bowl is also convenient for use by men and children, promoting better hygiene Super Swirl Siphon Flush SOTOMO MJ-80 toilet shoots water in a whirlpool around the bowl, scouring away debris twice as effectively as jet flushes. The 360 flushing technology generates a forceful swirling motion to keep the bowl clean longer and prevent clogging. Dual Flush System Toilet You can choose between a full flush and a half flush based on your needs, preventing the wastage of water resources. The average 1.28-gallon high-efficiency flush saves up to 16,500 gallons per year compared to an old 3.5-gallon toilet. 2" Fully Glazed Trapway SOTOMO one piece toilet’s fully glazed slick surface trapway minimizes the chances of a clog, while a 2" trapway ensures the effectiveness of the siphon flush, effectively carrying away waste. Enjoy peace of mind in your usage.

Soft Closing Seat Indulge in peace with our slow-close toilet seat—no more accidental slams, just gentle, silent closures. Enhance nighttime serenity, safeguarding your family's rest, while also extending the life of your toilet seat. Quick Release Toilet Seat The quick-release seat design makes installing and removing the toilet seat incredibly simple—just press and release the latch. It also facilitates easy cleaning of hard-to-reach corners. Installation Tips We recommend installing the Water Supply Valve approximately 6.5 inches to the left or right of the center of the toilet bowl and 6 inches above the floor. All in One Package Our products and accessories are packaged in a sturdy packaging, Including the toilet, soft-close toilet seat, pre-installed flush valve, premium wax ring, floor bolts, toilet tank lid, side cover sets and installation instructions.
